title: ATP World Tour 250, Montpellier Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: February 8, 2018 / 9:40 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago ATP World Tour 250, Montpellier Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Feb 8 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, Montpellier Men's Singles matches on Thursday .. Seeds ..
